title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item at the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: When attempting to select any item in the library outline view for the first time, the focus jumps to the library file node instead.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label in the library file.
2. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view for the first time.
OB: When trying to select any item in the library outline view for the first time, the focus jumps to the library file node instead.
EB: When attempting to select any item in the library outline view for the first time, the selected item should receive focus and be highlighted.
SR:
1. Add a label in the library file.
2. Navigate to the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view for the first time.
